text: Gogglebox is a British television reality show that premiered on Channel 4 on 7 March 2013. The show shows many families and groups of friends from different places around the United Kingdom who react to television programmes from their own homes. There is also a celebrity version. Gogglebox was narrated from its launch on 7 March 2013 until 8 April 2016 by Caroline Aherne. The show won a BAFTA award in 2014 and a National Television Award in 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. ==References== Category:BAFTA Award winning programmes Category:British reality television series Category:2013 British television series debuts
title: Gogglebox
